divs: Sighting DetailsOk, so there was a veld fire burning that has been burning for a few days and I was worried about the smoke and my parrots in the outside aviaries. I went for a walk to check how far the flames were and how immanent a threat. So I looked up the mountain on our property to see if I could see flames and not just smoke. So I noticed a 'plane' fly over. We get a lot of small planes around here, but then when I looked at it. It had no wings. I looked at it again, like a butterfly without wings, how does it fly? that couldn't possibly work is what I thought. If I had to describe it, from my view point in 2D. It was a long cream coloured rectangle with almost like a attachment on the back end. Like the hilt of a sword. It was not going fast, same speed as a little plane would fly, but NO WINGS. Not fast enough for a missle and there were no line behind it. It was just weird. Honestly it didn't have a lot of relevance at the moment the fire and the possibility of losing my home was a much bigger concern on my mind, I kept on my walk and checked on the flames and the wind speed. Also if anyone ever shows up here asking about UFOs I'll send you packing.
Summary: It was a warm dry Sunday and the veld fire was getting close to my farm-home, I went for a walk to check on the progress of the fire and this 'plane' flew overhead and it had no wings and I thought to myself, what the hell, how does that work?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clocolan
This sighting has never been favorited.
